DOC.brief_summary: CPG 7909 given alone to patients with renal cell cancer after their nephrectomy. CPG 7909 is as a subcutaneous injection once per week for up to 24 weeks. Up to 40 patients will be included in the study.
DOC.brief_title: CPG 7909 in Patients Wih Stage IV Renal Cell Cancer
DOC.criteria: Stage IV Renal Cell Carcinoma with lung and/or soft tissue metastasis Nephrectomy Measurable disease by RECIST criteria CNS, bone or Liver metastasis Tumors that are mainly papillary, chromophobe, medullary, collecting duct, or unclassified Prior immunotherapy, including IL2 or IFNalpha
DOC.keyword: Renal Cell Carcinoma, Phase I, Phase II, Immunotherapy
